meaningMnemonic: If you are about to <kanji>attain</kanji> <kanji>winter</kanji>, then it's the <vocabulary>winter solstice</vocabulary>. Happy winter, everyone!
readingMnemonic: The reading for 冬 is the on'yomi reading, and one you haven't learned before. You're going to want to think about how you are celebrating the <vocabulary>winter solstice</vocabulary> in one particular place, that place being <reading>とう</reading>きょう. See the Tokyo landmarks around you, think that you are there on the winter solstice, and also think about the things you are doing to celebrate, here in Tokyo. Also, watch out for the rendaku.
